statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE camera_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2021-08-01'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE radar_id = 2 AND lidar_id = 3
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location = 'Lab';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Lab' AND reading_value > 50;
DELETE FROM radar WHERE accuracy = 'high' AND location = 'front';
DELETE FROM lidar_data WHERE distance > 100 AND angle < 45;
DELETE FROM Radar WHERE location = 'Street A' AND radar_name = 'Radar 1';
